name: European Specialist Nurses Organisations
goal: The goal of European Specialist Nurses Organisations (ESNO) is to facilitate and provide an effective framework for communication and co-operation between the European Specialist Nurses Organisation and its constituent members in order to represent the mutual interests and benefits of these organisations to the wider European community, for the interest of the public health.
interests: Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
In the process for rcogintion process according the the directives 2013/55/EU
Devellop a common training framework for Specialist Nurses
Participate in relevant groups on professional devellopment in health.
Contribute to European health programs
